column3: Cute new coffee spot! I got a pastry and their matcha— they have a sweetened and unsweetened option, so make sure to ask if you like your tea strong! They also offer affogatos and a selection of soft drinks. The owner was there and he was really friendly and helpful.

Delicious coffees, house-made syrups (if you come at the right time you might smell their rose and lavender syrups steeping!), excellent pastry, with the kindest barista and coffee enthusiast behind the counter! I felt so welcomed immediately, and it’s in such a charming little corner of the Financial District.
☕️very tasty fragrant cappuccino, fresh pastries. Fast service, nice atmosphere. I recommend!🥰

Me and my friends go here at least once a week. The owner is super cool and puts so much effort and care into each cup from the drink inside to the logo that  is hand stamped on the cup. I usually don’t drink unsweetened coffee but the coffee here is so good I don’t need sugar. Would 100% recommend

The coffee bean used and the preparation method were impeccable.  As a result, the flavors are outstanding and memorable.  The host is awesome and fun! Go here if you love your coffee and conversation
All of the best lattes I’ve had in my life have been in this city, and this is probably in the top 3.
Best chai I’ve had in SF. They make it in house and it’s not too sweet and just the right amount of spice! Great pastry selection from starter bakery!!
Are you looking for real coffee prepared by an enthusiast? I stopped in twice in one morning, as I knew I had to get enough.
Delicious pastries and pour over coffee
